extension.summary: Automatically clone SportsDevil-fixes from al101 github master, copy it to addons folder and launch SportsDevil (containing fixes) afterwards. A simple way to keep SportsDevil always updated. [B][COLOR red]This addon is not an alternative repository and the author does not claim any rights on the SportsDevil plugin. SportsDevil must be installed first (from Max repo) for this script to work.[/B][/COLOR].
